pullrequest.title: Save buttons to the right, cancel buttons to the left

content.raw:
I made some changes to button roles and default actions when enter/escape keys are pressed in [issue_1366_ian](#!/osrf/gazebo/commits/a2b9d48) branch.

These changes respect the default layout on different platforms

The ordering is now:

- Don't Save, Exit | Cancel | Save and Exit

- Don't Save | Cancel | Save

- Cancel | Save

- Cancel | New Canvas

default button is Save and pressing escape invokes Cancel
